alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 4:49PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lake County through 515 PM EDT... At 449 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fruitland Park, or near Lake Griffin, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Tavares, Lady Lake, Lake Griffin, and Lisbon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
